channel.title: rejuvenate on Remote Work Library
channel.description: Recent content in rejuvenate on Remote Work Library

item.title: Health Checks
item.description: Health checks are a special form of feedback from colleagues in the team or company regarding how they are currently doing: mental, satisfaction with processes, tooling and goals.

item.title: Virtual Coffee Breaks
item.description: Breaks are important. Taking breaks together with colleagues is also important. What usually just happens in normal office routine needs some assistance in a remote work situation.
